column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Protester says : " Equality now !
#Text=" Protester says : " Nonbenders of Republic City ... " Korra says : " That 's the guy .
#Text=" Protester says : " Amon calls you to action !
#Text=Take back your city !
#Text=It 's time for the ... It 's you again !
#Text=You can not silence me , Avatar !
#Text=" Korra says : " Shut your yapper and listen up .
#Text=My friend got kidnapped by some chi blockers .
#Text=Where 'd they take him ?
#Text=" Protester says : " I have no idea what you 're talking about .
#Text=" Korra says : " Oh , I think you do .
#Text=" Mako says : " " Witness the Revelation tonight , nine o ' clock " .
#Text=What 's this " Revelation " ?
#Text=" Protester says : " Nothing that concerns the likes of you two !
#Text=" Korra says : " You better believe it concerns us .
#Text=Spill it .
#Text=" Protester says : " No one knows what the Revelation is !
#Text=And I have no idea what happened to your friend .
#Text=But if he 's a bender , then my bet is he 's getting what 's coming to him .
#Text=" Mako says : " Where 's it happening ?
#Text=" Policeman says : " Hey !
#Text=What 's going on over there ?
#Text=" Protester says : " The Avatar 's oppressing us .
#Text=Help !
#Text=" Korra says : " Let 's scram .
#Text=" Korra says : " Why did n't the Equalists put a location on these ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Probably because they do n't want just anyone waltzing in to their big " Revelation " , whatever that is .
#Text=I bet the information is hidden on here somehow .
#Text=Look at the backs .
#Text=There 's four different images .
#Text=" Korra says : " So , it 's a puzzle ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah , of a map !
#Text=" Mako says : " Bingo .
#Text=That must be where it 's going down .
#Text="
